Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.utils

Class ListUtility

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.ListUtility
public class ListUtility
extends java.lang.Object
This class defines some utility methods for lists of generic elements

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.lang.String listToString​(java.util.List<?> list)
    Utility method to have an Array.toString-type (without enclosing brackets) String representation of a list of generic elements
    static <T> void shiftRight​(java.util.List<T> list, int nPos)
    Utility method for right-shifting a list of generic elements for the specified number of times nPos.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • listToString

      public static java.lang.String listToString​(java.util.List<?> list)
      Utility method to have an Array.toString-type (without enclosing brackets) String representation of a list of generic elements
      Parameters:
      list - The list to be represented as a String
      Returns:
      A string of comma-separated String representations of the elements of the specified list

    • shiftRight

      public static <T> void shiftRight​(java.util.List<T> list, int nPos)
      Utility method for right-shifting a list of generic elements for the specified number of times nPos. A negative value for nPos is interpreted as a left-shift. nPos is normalized modulo the size of the list
      Type Parameters:
      T - The generic type of the list elements
      Parameters:
      list - The list to be right-shifted
      nPos - The number of times the specified list has to be right-shifted
